summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 DODGE 2500 PICKUP.  WHILE DRIVING 30 MPH THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED ON ITS OWN.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON.   THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO MAINTAIN CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  THE FAILURE OCCURRED 3-4 TIMES BEFORE THE CONTACT WAS ABLE TO PARK THE VEHICLE.  THE DEALER/MANUFACTURER DIAGNOSED THE VEHICLE AS NEEDING A NEW THROTTLE CONTROL SENSOR.  THE CONTACT REPLACED THE  THROTTLE CONTROL SENSOR.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGE WERE 75000.  *AK  UPDATED 05/12/08 *BF
